WHO AM I

The Short Story

My name is Nicky

I am from Bulgaria, Veliko Tarnovo - an old capital of our country, which always will keep the spirit of medieval Bulgaria. Lovely place!


From 2012 I live on the island ( UK ). I'm currently based in Newent, Gloucestershire, small and very nice place to live, of course with amazing ancient traditions and customs.


FRONT-END DEVELOPMENT TECHDEGREE

Team Treehouse

Course overview

Team Treehouse teach us everything we need to build a strong technical foundation, and on top of that HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Development tools and access to many more incredibly crafted courses, code challenges and quizzes.


Curriculum

The Techdegree consist of 12 Projects, 25 Courses, 157 Quizzes, 168 Code Challeges, or about 174 hours of incredible content. I would definitely recommend to everyone.


Unit 1 Activities

How to Make a Website - Course Share Your Projects with GutHub - Workshop Personal Profile Page - Project

Unit 2 Activities

CSS Basics - Course CSS Layout Basics - Course Responsive Images - Course Responsive Layout - Project

Unit 3 Activities

HTML Tables - Course HTML Forms - Course CSS Selectors - Course Online Registration Form - Project

Unit 4 Activities

JavaScript Basics - Course JavaScript Loops, Arrays and Objects - Course jQuery Basics - Course Using jQuery Plugins - Course Interactive Photo Gallery - Project

Unit 5 Activities

CSS to Sass - Course Sass Basics - Course CSS Flexbox Layout - Course CSS to Sass - Project

Unit 6 Activities

SVG Basics - Course Animating SVG with CSS - Course SVG Site Update - Project

Unit 7 Activities

Interactive Web Pages with JavaScript - Course Object-Oriented JavaScript - Course HTML Video and Audio - Course Interactive Video Player - Project

Unit 8 Activities

Accessibility - Course Accessibility Refactor - Project

Unit 9 Activities

Git Basics - Course Web App Dashboard - Project

Unit 10 Activities

AJAX Basics - Course Use a Public API to Create a Gallery - Project

Unit 11 Activities

Gulp Basics - Course Front End Performance Optimization - Course Optimizizng a Site for Performance - Project

Unit 12 Activities

Hosting a Website with GitHub Pages - Course Online Portfolio - Project
